source:
try:
    logInfo("Starting HR Gender dimension setup")
    
    
    logInfo("Creating view odw_curated_db.vw_dim_HR_Gender")
    
   
    spark.sql("""
    CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_curated_db.vw_dim_HR_Gender AS 
    SELECT DISTINCT 
        CASE GenderKey 
            WHEN 'Male' THEN 1 
            WHEN 'Female' THEN 2 
            ELSE NULL
        END AS dim_gender_key,
        CASE GenderKey 
            WHEN 'Male' THEN 'Male'
            WHEN 'Female' THEN 'Female'
            WHEN '' THEN 'Unknown'
            WHEN NULL THEN 'NULL'
            ELSE 'Unknown'
        END AS Gender
    FROM odw_harmonised_db.hist_SAP_HR
    """)
    logInfo("Successfully created view odw_curated_db.vw_dim_HR_Gender")
    
    
    gender_count = spark.sql("SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM odw_curated_db.vw_dim_HR_Gender").collect()[0]['count']
    logInfo(f"View contains {gender_count} distinct gender records")
    
    
    logInfo("Dropping table odw_curated_db.pbi_dim_HR_Gender if it exists")
    spark.sql("""
    DROP TABLE IF EXISTS odw_curated_db.pbi_dim_HR_Gender
    """)
    logInfo("Table dropped or did not exist")
    
    
    logInfo("Creating table odw_curated_db.pbi_dim_HR_Gender from view")
    spark.sql("""
    CREATE TABLE odw_curated_db.pbi_dim_HR_Gender
    USING delta
    AS
    SELECT * FROM odw_curated_db.vw_dim_HR_Gender
    """)
    
    
    table_count = spark.sql("SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM odw_curated_db.pbi_dim_HR_Gender").collect()[0]['count']
    logInfo(f"Created table with {table_count} records")
    
    
    logInfo("HR Gender dimension setup completed successfully")

except Exception as e:
    
    logError(f"Error in HR Gender dimension setup: {str(e)}")
    logException(e)
    
    
    raise e
finally:
    
    logInfo("Flushing logs")
    flushLogging()
